title: When I See The Blood
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Christ our Redeemer died on the cross,
Died for the sinner, paid all his due;
Sprinkle your soul with the blood of the Lamb,
"And I will pass, will pass over you."
v2: Chiefest of sinners, Jesus will save;
All He has promised, that will He do;
Wash in the fountain opened for sin,
"And I will pass, will pass over you."
v3: Judgment is coming, all will be there,
Each one receiving justly his due;
Hide in the saving, sin-cleansing blood,
"And I will pass, will pass over you."
v4: O great compassion! O boundless love!
O loving kindness, faithful and true!
Find peace and shelter under the blood,
"And I will pass, will pass over you."
c1: "When I see the blood, When I see the blood,
When I see the blood, I will pass, I will pass over you."
